CONSTRAINT_ENFORCEMENT.title: CONSTRAINT_ENFORCEMENT (enum)
CONSTRAINT_ENFORCEMENT.description: Apply a constraint enforcement in the embedded mesh coupling strategy

CONSTRAINT_ENFORCEMENT_PENALTYPARAM.title: CONSTRAINT_ENFORCEMENT_PENALTYPARAM (double)
CONSTRAINT_ENFORCEMENT_PENALTYPARAM.description: Penalty parameter for the constraint enforcement in embedded mesh coupling

COUPLING_STRATEGY.title: COUPLING_STRATEGY (enum)
COUPLING_STRATEGY.description: Strategy to couple background and overlapping mesh

MORTAR_SHAPE_FUNCTION.title: MORTAR_SHAPE_FUNCTION (enum)
MORTAR_SHAPE_FUNCTION.description: Shape functions that should be use in case of coupling using the Mortar/Lagrange  Multiplier method

PRESORT_STRATEGY.title: PRESORT_STRATEGY (enum)
PRESORT_STRATEGY.description: Presort strategy for the beam elements

STARTSTEP.title: STARTSTEP (int)
STARTSTEP.description: Time Step at which to begin the fluid beam coupling. Usually this will be the first step.

FLUID BEAM INTERACTION/BEAM TO FLUID MES.title: FLUID BEAM INTERACTION/BEAM TO FLUID MESHTYING (group)

CONSTRAINT_STRATEGY.title: CONSTRAINT_STRATEGY (enum)
CONSTRAINT_STRATEGY.description: Type of employed constraint enforcement strategy

GAUSS_POINTS.title: GAUSS_POINTS (int)
GAUSS_POINTS.description: Number of Gauss Points for the integral evaluations

GEOMETRY_PAIR_SEGMENTATION_NOT_ALL_GAUSS.title: GEOMETRY_PAIR_SEGMENTATION_NOT_ALL_GAUSS_POINTS_PROJECT_VALID_ACTION (enum)
GEOMETRY_PAIR_SEGMENTATION_NOT_ALL_GAUSS.description: What to do if not all Gauss points of a segment project valid

GEOMETRY_PAIR_SEGMENTATION_SEARCH_POINTS.title: GEOMETRY_PAIR_SEGMENTATION_SEARCH_POINTS (int)
GEOMETRY_PAIR_SEGMENTATION_SEARCH_POINTS.description: Number of search points for segmentation

INTEGRATION_POINTS_CIRCUMFERENCE.title: INTEGRATION_POINTS_CIRCUMFERENCE (int)
INTEGRATION_POINTS_CIRCUMFERENCE.description: Number of Integration points along the circumferential direction of the beam. This is parameter is only used in beam to cylinder meshtying. No gauss integration is used along the circumferential direction, equally spaced integration points are used.

MORTAR_SHAPE_FUNCTION.title: MORTAR_SHAPE_FUNCTION (enum)
MORTAR_SHAPE_FUNCTION.description: Shape function for the mortar Lagrange-multipliers

PENALTY_PARAMETER.title: PENALTY_PARAMETER (double)
PENALTY_PARAMETER.description: Penalty parameter for beam-to-Fluid volume meshtying

SEARCH_RADIUS.title: SEARCH_RADIUS (double)
SEARCH_RADIUS.description: Absolute Search radius for beam-to-fluid volume meshtying. Choose carefully to not blow up memory demand but to still find all interaction pairs!

FLUID BEAM INTERACTION/BEAM TO FLUID MES.title: FLUID BEAM INTERACTION/BEAM TO FLUID MESHTYING/RUNTIME VTK OUTPUT (group)

CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION.title: CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION (bool)
CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION.description: Enable / disable output of the constraint violation into a output_name.penalty csv file.

INTEGRATION_POINTS.title: INTEGRATION_POINTS (bool)
INTEGRATION_POINTS.description: Enable / disable output of used integration points. If the meshtying method has 'forces' at the integration point, they will also be output.

MORTAR_LAMBDA_CONTINUOUS.title: MORTAR_LAMBDA_CONTINUOUS (bool)
MORTAR_LAMBDA_CONTINUOUS.description: Enable / disable output of the continuous Lagrange multipliers function along the beam.

MORTAR_LAMBDA_CONTINUOUS_SEGMENTS.title: MORTAR_LAMBDA_CONTINUOUS_SEGMENTS (int)
MORTAR_LAMBDA_CONTINUOUS_SEGMENTS.description: Number of segments for continuous mortar output

MORTAR_LAMBDA_DISCRET.title: MORTAR_LAMBDA_DISCRET (bool)
MORTAR_LAMBDA_DISCRET.description: Enable / disable output of the discrete Lagrange multipliers at the node of the Lagrange multiplier shape functions.

NODAL_FORCES.title: NODAL_FORCES (bool)
NODAL_FORCES.description: Enable / disable output of the resulting nodal forces due to beam to Fluid interaction.

SEGMENTATION.title: SEGMENTATION (bool)
SEGMENTATION.description: Enable / disable output of segmentation points.

WRITE_OUTPUT.title: WRITE_OUTPUT (bool)
WRITE_OUTPUT.description: Enable / disable beam-to-fluid mesh tying output.

ADAPTCONV.title: ADAPTCONV (bool)
ADAPTCONV.description: Switch on adaptive control of linear solver tolerance for nonlinear solution

ADAPTCONV_BETTER.title: ADAPTCONV_BETTER (double)
ADAPTCONV_BETTER.description: The linear solver shall be this much better than the current nonlinear residual in the nonlinear convergence limit

BLOCKMATRIX.title: BLOCKMATRIX (bool)
BLOCKMATRIX.description: Indicates if system matrix should be assembled into a sparse block matrix type.

BODYFORCEFUNCNO.title: BODYFORCEFUNCNO (int)
BODYFORCEFUNCNO.description: Function for calculation of the body force for the weakly compressible problem

COMPUTE_DIVU.title: COMPUTE_DIVU (bool)
COMPUTE_DIVU.description: Compute divergence of velocity field at the element center

COMPUTE_EKIN.title: COMPUTE_EKIN (bool)
COMPUTE_EKIN.description: Compute kinetic energy at the end of each time step and write it to file.

CONVCHECK.title: CONVCHECK (enum)
CONVCHECK.description: Norm for convergence check (relative increments and absolute residuals)

CORRTERMFUNCNO.title: CORRTERMFUNCNO (int)
CORRTERMFUNCNO.description: Function for calculation of the correction term for the weakly compressible problem

GRIDVEL.title: GRIDVEL (enum)
GRIDVEL.description: scheme for determination of gridvelocity from displacements

INCONSISTENT_RESIDUAL.title: INCONSISTENT_RESIDUAL (bool)
INCONSISTENT_RESIDUAL.description: do not evaluate residual after solution has converged (->faster)

INFNORMSCALING.title: INFNORMSCALING (bool)
INFNORMSCALING.description: Scale blocks of matrix with row infnorm?

INITSTATITEMAX.title: INITSTATITEMAX (int)
INITSTATITEMAX.description: max number of nonlinear iterations for initial stationary solution

LIFTDRAG.title: LIFTDRAG (bool)
LIFTDRAG.description: Calculate lift and drag forces along specified boundary

LINEAR_SOLVER.title: LINEAR_SOLVER (int)
LINEAR_SOLVER.description: number of linear solver used for fluid dynamics

NEW_OST.title: NEW_OST (bool)
NEW_OST.description: Solve the Navier-Stokes equation with the new One Step Theta algorithm

NONLINEARBC.title: NONLINEARBC (bool)
NONLINEARBC.description: Flag to activate check for potential nonlinear boundary conditions

NUMSTASTEPS.title: NUMSTASTEPS (int)
NUMSTASTEPS.description: Number of Steps for Starting Scheme

OFF_PROC_ASSEMBLY.title: OFF_PROC_ASSEMBLY (bool)
OFF_PROC_ASSEMBLY.description: Do not evaluate ghosted elements but communicate them --> faster if element call is expensive

OSEENFIELDFUNCNO.title: OSEENFIELDFUNCNO (int)
OSEENFIELDFUNCNO.description: function number of Oseen advective field

OST_CONT_PRESS.title: OST_CONT_PRESS (enum)
OST_CONT_PRESS.description: One step theta option for time discretization of continuity eq. and pressure

PREDICTOR.title: PREDICTOR (enum)
PREDICTOR.description: Predictor for first guess in nonlinear iteration

PRESSAVGBC.title: PRESSAVGBC (bool)
PRESSAVGBC.description: Flag to (de)activate imposition of boundary condition for the considered element average pressure

SIMPLER_SOLVER.title: SIMPLER_SOLVER (int)
SIMPLER_SOLVER.description: number of linear solver used for fluid dynamic (ONLY NECESSARY FOR BlockGaussSeidel solver block within fluid mehstying case any more!!!!)

STAB_DEN_REF.title: STAB_DEN_REF (double)
STAB_DEN_REF.description: Reference stabilization parameter for the density for the HDG weakly compressible formulation

STAB_MOM_REF.title: STAB_MOM_REF (double)
STAB_MOM_REF.description: Reference stabilization parameter for the momentum for the HDG weakly compressible formulation

START_THETA.title: START_THETA (double)
START_THETA.description: Time integration factor for starting scheme

STRONG_REDD_3D_COUPLING_TYPE.title: STRONG_REDD_3D_COUPLING_TYPE (bool)
STRONG_REDD_3D_COUPLING_TYPE.description: Flag to (de)activate potential Strong 3D redD coupling

VARVISCFUNCNO.title: VARVISCFUNCNO (int)
VARVISCFUNCNO.description: Function for calculation of a variable viscosity for the weakly compressible problem

VELGRAD_PROJ_SOLVER.title: VELGRAD_PROJ_SOLVER (int)
VELGRAD_PROJ_SOLVER.description: Number of linear solver used for L2 projection

WSS_ML_AGR_SOLVER.title: WSS_ML_AGR_SOLVER (int)
WSS_ML_AGR_SOLVER.description: Set ML-solver number for smoothing of residual-based calculated wallshearstress via plain aggregation.

WSS_TYPE.title: WSS_TYPE (enum)
WSS_TYPE.description: which type of stresses and wall shear stress

EOS_CONV_CROSS.title: EOS_CONV_CROSS (enum)
EOS_CONV_CROSS.description: Flag to (de)activate convective crosswind edge-based stabilization. Options:do not use convective crosswind edge-based stabilization, or, use convective crosswind edge-based stabilization as standard edge-based stabilization on the entire domain, or, use convective crosswind edge-based stabilization as xfem ghost-penalty stabilization just around cut elements

EOS_CONV_STREAM.title: EOS_CONV_STREAM (enum)
EOS_CONV_STREAM.description: Flag to (de)activate convective streamline edge-based stabilization. Options: do not use convective streamline edge-based stabilization, or, use convective streamline edge-based stabilization as standard edge-based stabilization on the entire domain, or, use convective streamline edge-based stabilization as xfem ghost-penalty stabilization just around cut elements

EOS_DEFINITION_TAU.title: EOS_DEFINITION_TAU (enum)
EOS_DEFINITION_TAU.description: Definition of stabilization parameter for edge-based stabilization

EOS_DIV.title: EOS_DIV (enum)
EOS_DIV.description: Flag to (de)activate divergence edge-based stabilization. Options: do not use divergence edge-based stabilization, or, divergence edge-based stabilization based on velocity jump on the entire domain, or, divergence edge-based stabilization based on divergence jump just around cut elements, or, divergence edge-based stabilization based on velocity jump on the entire domain, or, divergence edge-based stabilization based on divergence jump just around cut elements

EOS_H_DEFINITION.title: EOS_H_DEFINITION (enum)
EOS_H_DEFINITION.description: Definition of element length for edge-based stabilization. Options:take the maximal (nsd-1)D diameter of faces that connect the internal face to its opposite faces, or, take the maximal 1D distance along 1D edge to opposite surface for both parent elements, or, take the maximal (nsd-1)D face diameter of all faces for both parent elements, or, maximal nD diameter of the neighboring elements, or, maximal (n-1)D diameter of the internal face/edge, or, take the maximal volume equivalent diameter of adjacent elements

EOS_PRES.title: EOS_PRES (enum)
EOS_PRES.description: Flag to (de)activate pressure edge-based stabilization. Options: do not use pressure edge-based stabilization, or, use pressure edge-based stabilization as standard edge-based stabilization on the entire domain, or, use pressure edge-based stabilization as xfem ghost-penalty stabilization just around cut elements

PRES_KRYLOV_2Dz.title: PRES_KRYLOV_2Dz (bool)
PRES_KRYLOV_2Dz.description: residual based without second derivatives (i.e. only consistent for tau->0, but faster)

ADAPT_CSGS_PHI.title: ADAPT_CSGS_PHI (bool)
ADAPT_CSGS_PHI.description: Flag to (de)activate adaption of CsgsD to CsgsB.

BETA.title: BETA (double)
BETA.description: Cross- and Reynolds-stress terms only on right-hand-side.

CALC_N.title: CALC_N (bool)
CALC_N.description: Flag to (de)activate calculation of N from the Reynolds number.

CONSISTENT_FLUID_RESIDUAL.title: CONSISTENT_FLUID_RESIDUAL (bool)
CONSISTENT_FLUID_RESIDUAL.description: Flag to (de)activate the consistency term for residual-based stabilization.

CONVFORM.title: CONVFORM (enum)
CONVFORM.description:
form of convective term
convective: Use the convective form.
conservative: Use the conservative form.

CSGS_PHI.title: CSGS_PHI (double)
CSGS_PHI.description: Modelparameter of multifractal subgrid-scales for scalar transport.

C_DIFF.title: C_DIFF (double)
C_DIFF.description: Proportionality constant between Re*Pr and ratio dissipative scale to element length. Usually equal cnu.

C_NU.title: C_NU (double)
C_NU.description: Proportionality constant between Re and ratio viscous scale to element length.

EVALUATION_B.title: EVALUATION_B (enum)
EVALUATION_B.description:
Location where B is evaluated
element_center: evaluate B at element center.
integration_point: evaluate B at integration point.

LOMA_CONTI.title: LOMA_CONTI (bool)
LOMA_CONTI.description: Flag to (de)activate cross- and Reynolds-stress terms in loma continuity equation.

ML_SOLVER.title: ML_SOLVER (int)
ML_SOLVER.description: Set solver number for scale separation via level set transfer operators from plain aggregation.

N.title: N (double)
N.description: Set grid to viscous scale ratio.

NEAR_WALL_LIMIT_CSGS_PHI.title: NEAR_WALL_LIMIT_CSGS_PHI (bool)
NEAR_WALL_LIMIT_CSGS_PHI.description: Flag to (de)activate near-wall limit for scalar field.

REF_LENGTH.title: REF_LENGTH (enum)
REF_LENGTH.description:
Specify the reference length for Re-dependent N.
cube_edge: edge length of volume equivalent cube.
sphere_diameter: diameter of volume equivalent sphere.
streamlength: streamlength taken from stabilization.
gradient_based: gradient based length taken from stabilization.
metric_tensor: metric tensor taken from stabilization.

REF_VELOCITY.title: REF_VELOCITY (enum)
REF_VELOCITY.description:
Specify the reference velocity for Re-dependent N.
strainrate: norm of strain rate.
resolved: resolved velocity.
fine_scale: fine-scale velocity.

SCALE_SEPARATION.title: SCALE_SEPARATION (enum)
SCALE_SEPARATION.description:
Specify the filter type for scale separation in LES.
no_scale_sep: no scale separation.
box_filter: classical box filter.
algebraic_multigrid_operator: scale separation by algebraic multigrid operator.

SET_FINE_SCALE_VEL.title: SET_FINE_SCALE_VEL (bool)
SET_FINE_SCALE_VEL.description: Flag to set fine-scale velocity for parallel nightly tests.

TOL_PRES_INC.title: TOL_PRES_INC (double)
TOL_PRES_INC.description: Tolerance for convergence check of pressure increment

TOL_PRES_RES.title: TOL_PRES_RES (double)
TOL_PRES_RES.description: Tolerance for convergence check of pressure residual

TOL_VEL_INC.title: TOL_VEL_INC (double)
TOL_VEL_INC.description: Tolerance for convergence check of velocity increment

TOL_VEL_RES.title: TOL_VEL_RES (double)
TOL_VEL_RES.description: Tolerance for convergence check of velocity residual

CROSS-STRESS.title: CROSS-STRESS (enum)
CROSS-STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate cross-stress term -> residual-based VMM.

EVALUATION_MAT.title: EVALUATION_MAT (enum)
EVALUATION_MAT.description: Location where material law is evaluated

INCONSISTENT.title: INCONSISTENT (bool)
INCONSISTENT.description: residual based without second derivatives (i.e. only consistent for tau->0, but faster)

LOMA_CONTI_CROSS_STRESS.title: LOMA_CONTI_CROSS_STRESS (enum)
LOMA_CONTI_CROSS_STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate cross-stress term loma continuity equation-> residual-based VMM.

LOMA_CONTI_REYNOLDS_STRESS.title: LOMA_CONTI_REYNOLDS_STRESS (enum)
LOMA_CONTI_REYNOLDS_STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate Reynolds-stress term loma continuity equation-> residual-based VMM.

LOMA_CONTI_SUPG.title: LOMA_CONTI_SUPG (bool)
LOMA_CONTI_SUPG.description: Flag to (de)activate SUPG stabilization in loma continuity equation.

REYNOLDS-STRESS.title: REYNOLDS-STRESS (enum)
REYNOLDS-STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate Reynolds-stress term -> residual-based VMM.

RSTAB.title: RSTAB (enum)
RSTAB.description: Flag to (de)activate reactive term in residual-based stabilization.

Reconstruct_Sec_Der.title: Reconstruct_Sec_Der (bool)
Reconstruct_Sec_Der.description: residual computed with a reconstruction of the second derivatives via projection or superconvergent patch recovery

STABTYPE.title: STABTYPE (enum)
STABTYPE.description:
Apply (un)stabilized fluid formulation. No stabilization is only possible for inf-sup stable elements. Use a residual-based stabilization or, more generally, a stabilization 
based on the concept of the residual-based variational multiscale method...
Expecting additional inputUse an edge-based stabilization, especially for XFEM

STAB_BIOT_SCALING.title: STAB_BIOT_SCALING (double)
STAB_BIOT_SCALING.description: Scaling factor for stabilization parameter for biot stabilization of porous flow.

TDS.title: TDS (enum)
TDS.description: Flag to allow time dependency of subscales for residual-based stabilization.

TRANSIENT.title: TRANSIENT (enum)
TRANSIENT.description: Specify how to treat the transient term.

VSTAB.title: VSTAB (enum)
VSTAB.description: Flag to (de)activate viscous term in residual-based stabilization.

CROSS-STRESS.title: CROSS-STRESS (enum)
CROSS-STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate cross-stress term -> residual-based VMM. Options:No cross-stress term, or,Include the cross-stress term with a linearization of the convective part, or, Include cross-stress term, but only explicitly on right hand side

EVALUATION_MAT.title: EVALUATION_MAT (enum)
EVALUATION_MAT.description: Location where material law is evaluated

INCONSISTENT.title: INCONSISTENT (bool)
INCONSISTENT.description: residual based without second derivatives (i.e. only consistent for tau->0, but faster)

LOMA_CONTI_CROSS_STRESS.title: LOMA_CONTI_CROSS_STRESS (enum)
LOMA_CONTI_CROSS_STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate cross-stress term loma continuity equation-> residual-based VMM.

LOMA_CONTI_REYNOLDS_STRESS.title: LOMA_CONTI_REYNOLDS_STRESS (enum)
LOMA_CONTI_REYNOLDS_STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate Reynolds-stress term loma continuity equation-> residual-based VMM.

LOMA_CONTI_SUPG.title: LOMA_CONTI_SUPG (bool)
LOMA_CONTI_SUPG.description: Flag to (de)activate SUPG stabilization in loma continuity equation.

REYNOLDS-STRESS.title: REYNOLDS-STRESS (enum)
REYNOLDS-STRESS.description: Flag to (de)activate Reynolds-stress term -> residual-based VMM.

RSTAB.title: RSTAB (enum)
RSTAB.description: Flag to (de)activate reactive term in residual-based stabilization.

Reconstruct_Sec_Der.title: Reconstruct_Sec_Der (bool)
Reconstruct_Sec_Der.description: residual computed with a reconstruction of the second derivatives via projection or superconvergent patch recovery

STABTYPE.title: STABTYPE (enum)
STABTYPE.description:
Apply (un)stabilized fluid formulation. No stabilization is only possible for inf-sup stable elements.Use a residual-based stabilization or, more generally, a stabilization 
based on the concept of the residual-based variational multiscale method...
Expecting additional input. Use an edge-based stabilization, especially for XFEM. Alternative: Element/cell based polynomial pressure projection, see Dohrmann/Bochev 2004, IJNMF

TDS.title: TDS (enum)
TDS.description: Flag to allow time dependency of subscales for residual-based stabilization.

TRANSIENT.title: TRANSIENT (enum)
TRANSIENT.description: Specify how to treat the transient term. Use transient term (recommended for time dependent subscales) or use transient term including a linearisation of 1/tau

VSTAB.title: VSTAB (enum)
VSTAB.description: Flag to (de)activate viscous term in residual-based stabilization. Options: No viscous term in stabilization, or, Viscous stabilization of GLS type, or, Viscous stabilization of GLS type, included only on the right hand side, or, Viscous stabilization of USFEM type, or, Viscous stabilization of USFEM type, included only on the right hand side

CHANNEL_L_TAU.title: CHANNEL_L_TAU (double)
CHANNEL_L_TAU.description:
Used for normalisation of the wall normal distance in the Van 
Driest Damping function. May be taken from the output of 
the apply_mesh_stretching.pl preprocessing script.

C_SMAGORINSKY.title: C_SMAGORINSKY (double)
C_SMAGORINSKY.description: Constant for the Smagorinsky model. Something between 0.1 to 0.24. Vreman constant if the constant vreman model is applied (something between 0.07 and 0.01).

C_TURBPRANDTL.title: C_TURBPRANDTL (double)
C_TURBPRANDTL.description: (Constant) turbulent Prandtl number for the Smagorinsky model in scalar transport.

C_YOSHIZAWA.title: C_YOSHIZAWA (double)
C_YOSHIZAWA.description: Constant for the compressible Smagorinsky model: isotropic part of subgrid-stress tensor. About 0.09 or 0.0066. Ci will not be squared!

FILTER_WIDTH.title: FILTER_WIDTH (enum)
FILTER_WIDTH.description: The Vreman model requires a filter width.

ADAPTIVE_DT_INC.title: ADAPTIVE_DT_INC (double)
ADAPTIVE_DT_INC.description: Increment of whole step for adaptive dt via CFL

ADAPTIVE_TIME_STEP_ESTIMATOR.title: ADAPTIVE_TIME_STEP_ESTIMATOR (enum)
ADAPTIVE_TIME_STEP_ESTIMATOR.description: Method used to determine adaptive time step size.

CFL_NUMBER.title: CFL_NUMBER (double)
CFL_NUMBER.description: CFL number for adaptive time step

FREEZE_ADAPTIVE_DT_AT.title: FREEZE_ADAPTIVE_DT_AT (int)
FREEZE_ADAPTIVE_DT_AT.description: keep time step constant after this step, otherwise turbulence statistics sampling is not consistent

CANONICAL_FLOW.title: CANONICAL_FLOW (enum)
CANONICAL_FLOW.description:
Sampling is different for different canonical flows - so specify what kind of flow you've got 

no: The flow is not further specified, so spatial averaging and hence the standard sampling procedure is not possible
time_averaging: The flow is not further specified, but time averaging of velocity and pressure field is performed
channel_flow_of_height_2: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in the homogeneous planes - it is essentially a statistically one dimensional flow.
square_cylinder_nurbs: For this flow, statistical data are evaluated on various lines of the xy-midplane, averaged over time and eventually in one home.direction.
rotating_circular_cylinder_nurbs: For this flow, statistical data is computed in concentric surfaces and averaged. in time and in one home. direction
rotating_circular_cylinder_nurbs_scatra: For this flow with mass transport, statistical data is computed in concentric surfaces and averaged. in time and in one home. direction
loma_channel_flow_of_height_2: For this low-Mach-number flow, all statistical data could be averaged in the homogeneous planes - it is essentially a statistically one dimensional flow.
combust_oracles: ORACLES test rig for turbulent premixed combustion.
bubbly_channel_flow: Turbulent two-phase flow: bubbly channel flow, statistical data are averaged in homogeneous planes and over time.
scatra_channel_flow_of_height_2: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in the homogeneous planes - it is essentially a statistically one dimensional flow.
decaying_homogeneous_isotropic_turbulence: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in the in all homogeneous directions  - it is essentially a statistically zero dimensional flow.
forced_homogeneous_isotropic_turbulence: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in the in all homogeneous directions  - it is essentially a statistically zero dimensional flow.
scatra_forced_homogeneous_isotropic_turbulence: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in the in all homogeneous directions  - it is essentially a statistically zero dimensional flow.
periodic_hill: For this flow, statistical data is evaluated on various lines, averaged over time and z.
blood_fda_flow: For this flow, statistical data is evaluated on various planes.

CHAN_AMPL_INIT_DIST.title: CHAN_AMPL_INIT_DIST (double)
CHAN_AMPL_INIT_DIST.description: Max. amplitude of the random disturbance in percent of the initial value in mean flow direction.

CHA_NUMSUBDIVISIONS.title: CHA_NUMSUBDIVISIONS (int)
CHA_NUMSUBDIVISIONS.description: Number of homogeneous sampling planes in element

DUMPING_PERIOD.title: DUMPING_PERIOD (int)
DUMPING_PERIOD.description: Period of time steps after which statistical data shall be dumped

EXCLUDE_XFEM.title: EXCLUDE_XFEM (bool)
EXCLUDE_XFEM.description: Flag to (de)activate XFEM dofs in calculation of fine-scale velocity.

FORCING_TIME_STEPS.title: FORCING_TIME_STEPS (int)
FORCING_TIME_STEPS.description: Number of time steps during which forcing is applied

HOMDIR.title: HOMDIR (enum)
HOMDIR.description:
Specify the homogeneous direction(s) of a flow.
not_specified: no homogeneous directions available, averaging is restricted to time averaging
x: average along x-direction
y: average along y-direction
z: average along z-direction
xy: Wall normal direction is z, average in x and y direction
xz: Wall normal direction is y, average in x and z direction
yz: Wall normal direction is x, average in y and z direction
xyz: Averaging in all directions

MEAN_SCALAR_GRADIENT.title: MEAN_SCALAR_GRADIENT (double)
MEAN_SCALAR_GRADIENT.description: Value of imposed mean-scalar gradient to force scalar field.

PHYSICAL_MODEL.title: PHYSICAL_MODEL (enum)
PHYSICAL_MODEL.description: If classical LES is our turbulence approach, this is a contradiction and should cause a FOUR_C_THROW. Classical constant coefficient Smagorinsky model. Be careful if you have a wall bounded flow domain! Use an exponential damping function for the turbulent viscosity close to the wall. This is only implemented for a channel geometry of height 2 in y direction. The viscous lengthscale l_tau is required as additional input. The solution is filtered and by comparison of the filtered velocity field with the real solution, the Smagorinsky constant is estimated in each step --- mind that this procedure includes an averaging in the xz plane, hence this implementation will only work for a channel flow. Multifractal Subgrid-Scale Modeling based on the work of burton. Vremans constant model. Dynamic Vreman model according to You and Moin (2007)

SAMPLING_START.title: SAMPLING_START (int)
SAMPLING_START.description: Time step after when sampling shall be started

SAMPLING_STOP.title: SAMPLING_STOP (int)
SAMPLING_STOP.description: Time step when sampling shall be stopped

SCALAR_FORCING.title: SCALAR_FORCING (enum)
SCALAR_FORCING.description:
no: Do not force the scalar field
isotropic: Force scalar field isotropically such as the fluid field.
mean_scalar_gradient: Force scalar field by imposed mean-scalar gradient.

SUBGRID_DISSIPATION.title: SUBGRID_DISSIPATION (bool)
SUBGRID_DISSIPATION.description: Flag to (de)activate estimation of subgrid-scale dissipation (only for seclected flows).

THRESHOLD_WAVENUMBER.title: THRESHOLD_WAVENUMBER (double)
THRESHOLD_WAVENUMBER.description: Forcing is only applied to wave numbers lower or equal than the given threshold wave number.

TURBMODEL_LS.title: TURBMODEL_LS (bool)
TURBMODEL_LS.description: Flag to (de)activate turbulence model in level-set equation

TURBULENCE_APPROACH.title: TURBULENCE_APPROACH (enum)
TURBULENCE_APPROACH.description: Try to solve flow as an underresolved DNS. Mind that your stabilisation already acts as a kind of turbulence model! Perform a classical Large Eddy Simulation adding addititional turbulent viscosity. This may be based on various physical models.)

CANONICAL_INFLOW.title: CANONICAL_INFLOW (enum)
CANONICAL_INFLOW.description:
Sampling is different for different canonical flows 
--- so specify what kind of flow you've got
no: The flow is not further specified, so spatial averaging 
and hence the standard sampling procedure is not possible.
time_averaging: The flow is not further specified, but time averaging of velocity and pressure field is performed.
channel_flow_of_height_2: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in 
the homogeneous planes --- it is essentially a statistically one dimensional flow.
loma_channel_flow_of_height_2: For this low-Mach-number flow, all statistical data could be averaged in 
the homogeneous planes --- it is essentially a statistically one dimensional flow.
scatra_channel_flow_of_height_2: For this flow, all statistical data could be averaged in 
the homogeneous planes --- it is essentially a statistically one dimensional flow.

INFLOWFUNC.title: INFLOWFUNC (int)
INFLOWFUNC.description: Function number for initial flow field in inflow section

INFLOW_CHA_SIDE.title: INFLOW_CHA_SIDE (double)
INFLOW_CHA_SIDE.description: Most right side of inflow channel. Necessary to define sampling domain.

INFLOW_DUMPING_PERIOD.title: INFLOW_DUMPING_PERIOD (int)
INFLOW_DUMPING_PERIOD.description: Period of time steps after which statistical data shall be dumped

INFLOW_HOMDIR.title: INFLOW_HOMDIR (enum)
INFLOW_HOMDIR.description:
Specify the homogeneous direction(s) of a flow
not_specified: no homogeneous directions available, averaging is restricted to time averaging.
x: average along x-direction.
y: average along y-direction.
z: average along z-direction.
xy: Wall normal direction is z, average in x and y direction.
xz: Wall normal direction is y, average in x and z direction (standard case).
yz: Wall normal direction is x, average in y and z direction.

INFLOW_INIT_DIST.title: INFLOW_INIT_DIST (double)
INFLOW_INIT_DIST.description: Max. amplitude of the random disturbance in percent of the initial value in mean flow direction.

INFLOW_SAMPLING_START.title: INFLOW_SAMPLING_START (int)
INFLOW_SAMPLING_START.description: Time step after when sampling shall be started

INFLOW_SAMPLING_STOP.title: INFLOW_SAMPLING_STOP (int)
INFLOW_SAMPLING_STOP.description: Time step when sampling shall be stopped

NUMINFLOWSTEP.title: NUMINFLOWSTEP (int)
NUMINFLOWSTEP.description: Total number of time steps for development of turbulent flow

TURBULENTINFLOW.title: TURBULENTINFLOW (bool)
TURBULENTINFLOW.description: Flag to (de)activate potential separate turbulent inflow section

Blending_Type.title: Blending_Type (enum)
Blending_Type.description:
Methods for blending the enrichment space.
none: No ramp function, does not converge!
ramp_function: Enrichment is multiplied with linear ramp function resulting in zero enrichment at the interface.

C_Tauw.title: C_Tauw (double)
C_Tauw.description: Constant wall shear stress for Spalding's law, if applicable

GP_Wall_Normal.description: Gauss points in wall normal direction

GP_Wall_Normal_Off_Wall.title: GP_Wall_Normal_Off_Wall (int)
GP_Wall_Normal_Off_Wall.description: Gauss points in wall normal direction, off-wall elements

GP_Wall_Parallel.title: GP_Wall_Parallel (int)
GP_Wall_Parallel.description: Gauss points in wall parallel direction

Inc_Tauw.title: Inc_Tauw (double)
Inc_Tauw.description: Increment of Tauw of full step, between 0.0 and 1.0

Min_Tauw.title: Min_Tauw (double)
Min_Tauw.description: Minimum wall shear stress preventing system to become singular

Projection.description: Flag to switch projection of the enriched dofs after updating tauw, alternatively with or without continuity constraint.

Switch_Step.title: Switch_Step (int)
Switch_Step.description: Switch from gradient to residual based tauw.

Tauw_Calc_Type.description:

gradient_to_residual: First gradient, then residual.

Tauw_Type.description:

X_WALL.title: X_WALL (bool)
X_WALL.description: Flag to switch on the xwall model

FLUID GEOMETRY.title: FLUID GEOMETRY (group)
FLUID GEOMETRY.description: Settings related to the geometry of discretization FLUID

INCTOL.title: INCTOL (string)
INCTOL.description:
Tolerance in the increment norm for the Newton iteration. 
For NORM_INC != \*_split only the first value is used for all fields. 
Order of fields: porofluidvelocity, porofluidpressure, porostructure, fluidvelocity, fluidpressure, ale

ITEMAX.description: Maximum number of iterations over fields

NORM_RESF.description:
Type of norm for primary variables convergence check.

PreconditiondKrylov: only first number is used for finest level

BASETOL.title: BASETOL (double)
BASETOL.description:
Basic tolerance for adaptive convergence check in monolithic FSI.
This tolerance will be used for the linear solve of the FSI block system.
The linear convergence test will always use the relative residual norm (AZ_r0).
Not to be confused with the Newton tolerance (CONVTOL) that applies
to the nonlinear convergence test using a absolute residual norm.

SOLVE.description: Solution for evolution equation: OST (default) or CONVOL (convolution integral)

entries in the thermal conductivity tensor. Setting one value resembles a scalar conductivity, 2 or 3 values a diagonal conductivity and 4 or 9 values the full conductivity tensor in two and three dimensions respectively.
choices are: constant, from_file

MAT_soret.description: material for heat transport due to Fourier-type thermal conduction and the Soret effect

CONDUCT.title: CONDUCT (selection)
CONDUCT.description:
entries in the thermal conductivity tensor. Setting one value resembles a scalar conductivity, 2 or 3 values a diagonal conductivity and 4 or 9 values the full conductivity tensor in two and three dimensions respectively.
choices are: constant, from_file

COUPLEDDOFS_ARTSCATRA.title: COUPLEDDOFS_ARTSCATRA (string)
COUPLEDDOFS_ARTSCATRA.description: coupled artery dofs for mesh tying

COUPLEDDOFS_SCATRA.title: COUPLEDDOFS_SCATRA (string)
COUPLEDDOFS_SCATRA.description: coupled porofluid dofs for mesh tying

ABSTOLRES.title: ABSTOLRES (double)
ABSTOLRES.description: Absolute tolerance for deciding if residual of nonlinear problem is already zero

ADAPTCONV.title: ADAPTCONV (bool)
ADAPTCONV.description: Switch on adaptive control of linear solver tolerance for nonlinear solution

ADAPTCONV_BETTER.title: ADAPTCONV_BETTER (double)
ADAPTCONV_BETTER.description: The linear solver shall be this much better than the current nonlinear residual in the nonlinear convergence limit

CONVTOL_OUTER.title: CONVTOL_OUTER (double)
CONVTOL_OUTER.description: Convergence check tolerance for outer loop in partitioned coupling schemes (natural convection, multi-scale simulations etc.)

EXPLPREDICT.title: EXPLPREDICT (bool)
EXPLPREDICT.description: do an explicit predictor step before starting nonlinear iteration

ITEMAX_OUTER.title: ITEMAX_OUTER (int)
ITEMAX_OUTER.description: Maximum number of outer iterations in partitioned coupling schemes (natural convection, multi-scale simulations etc.)

INTLAYERGROWTH_CONVTOL.title: INTLAYERGROWTH_CONVTOL (double)
INTLAYERGROWTH_CONVTOL.description: local Newton-Raphson convergence tolerance for scatra-scatra interface coupling involving interface layer growth

INTLAYERGROWTH_EVALUATION.title: INTLAYERGROWTH_EVALUATION (enum)
INTLAYERGROWTH_EVALUATION.description: flag for evaluation of scatra-scatra interface coupling involving interface layer growth

INTLAYERGROWTH_ITEMAX.title: INTLAYERGROWTH_ITEMAX (int)
INTLAYERGROWTH_ITEMAX.description: maximum number of local Newton-Raphson iterations for scatra-scatra interface coupling involving interface layer growth

INTLAYERGROWTH_LINEAR_SOLVER.title: INTLAYERGROWTH_LINEAR_SOLVER (int)
INTLAYERGROWTH_LINEAR_SOLVER.description: ID of linear solver for monolithic scatra-scatra interface coupling involving interface layer growth

INTLAYERGROWTH_TIMESTEP.title: INTLAYERGROWTH_TIMESTEP (double)
INTLAYERGROWTH_TIMESTEP.description: modified time step size for scatra-scatra interface coupling involving interface layer growth

LMSIDE.title: LMSIDE (enum)
LMSIDE.description: flag for interface side underlying Lagrange multiplier definition

MESHTYING_CONDITIONS_INDEPENDENT_SETUP.title: MESHTYING_CONDITIONS_INDEPENDENT_SETUP (bool)
MESHTYING_CONDITIONS_INDEPENDENT_SETUP.description: mesh tying for different conditions should be setup independently

OUTPUT_INTERFACE_FLUX.title: OUTPUT_INTERFACE_FLUX (bool)
OUTPUT_INTERFACE_FLUX.description: evaluate integral of coupling flux on slave side for each s2i condition and write it to csv file

SLAVEONLY.title: SLAVEONLY (bool)
SLAVEONLY.description: flag for evaluation of interface linearizations and residuals on slave side only

ASSUGRDIFF.title: ASSUGRDIFF (bool)
ASSUGRDIFF.description: potential incorporation of all-scale subgrid diffusivity (a.k.a. discontinuity-capturing) term

EVALUATION_MAT.title: EVALUATION_MAT (enum)
EVALUATION_MAT.description: Location where material law is evaluated

STABTYPE.title: STABTYPE (enum)
STABTYPE.description: Type of stabilization (if any). No stabilization is only reasonable for low-Peclet-number.

TAU_VALUE.title: TAU_VALUE (double)
TAU_VALUE.description: Numerical value for tau for stabilization

E.title: E (int)
E.description: ID of the condition. This ID refers to the respective topological entity of the condition.

ENTITY_TYPE.title: ENTITY_TYPE (enum)
ENTITY_TYPE.description: The type of entity that E refers to.

E.title: E (int)
E.description: ID of the condition. This ID refers to the respective topological entity of the condition.

ENTITY_TYPE.title: ENTITY_TYPE (enum)
ENTITY_TYPE.description: The type of entity that E refers to.

DISSIPATION_MODE.title: DISSIPATION_MODE (enum)
DISSIPATION_MODE.description: method to calculate the plastic dissipation

NORMCOMBI_DISPPLASTINCR.title: NORMCOMBI_DISPPLASTINCR (enum)
NORMCOMBI_DISPPLASTINCR.description: binary operator to combine displacement increments and plastic flow (Delta Lp) increment values

NORMCOMBI_EASINCR.title: NORMCOMBI_EASINCR (enum)
NORMCOMBI_EASINCR.description: binary operator to combine displacement increments and EAS increment values

NORMCOMBI_EASRES.title: NORMCOMBI_EASRES (enum)
NORMCOMBI_EASRES.description: binary operator to combine EAS-residual and residual force values

NORMCOMBI_RESFPLASTCONSTR.title: NORMCOMBI_RESFPLASTCONSTR (enum)
NORMCOMBI_RESFPLASTCONSTR.description: binary operator to combine plasticity constraints and residual force values

SEMI_SMOOTH_CPL.title: SEMI_SMOOTH_CPL (double)
SEMI_SMOOTH_CPL.description: Weighting factor cpl for semi-smooth PDASS

STABILIZATION_S.title: STABILIZATION_S (double)
STABILIZATION_S.description: Stabilization factor s for semi-smooth PDASS

TOLDELTALP.title: TOLDELTALP (double)
TOLDELTALP.description: tolerance in the plastic flow (Delta Lp) norm for the Newton iteration

TOLEASINCR.title: TOLEASINCR (double)
TOLEASINCR.description: tolerance in the EAS increment norm for the Newton iteration

TOLEASRES.title: TOLEASRES (double)
TOLEASRES.description: tolerance in the EAS residual norm for the newton iteration

TOLPLASTCONSTR.title: TOLPLASTCONSTR (double)
TOLPLASTCONSTR.description: tolerance in the plastic constraint norm for the newton iteration

AMGNXN_TYPE.title: AMGNXN_TYPE (string)
AMGNXN_TYPE.description: Name of the pre-built preconditioner to be used. If set to"XML" the preconditioner is defined using a xml file

AMGNXN_XML_FILE.title: AMGNXN_XML_FILE (path or null)
AMGNXN_XML_FILE.description: xml file defining the AMGnxn preconditioner

AZCONV.title: AZCONV (enum)
AZCONV.description: The implicit residual norm scaling type to use for terminating the iterative solver.

AZITER.title: AZITER (int)
AZITER.description: The maximum number of iterations the underlying iterative solver is allowed to perform

AZOUTPUT.title: AZOUTPUT (int)
AZOUTPUT.description: The number of iterations between each output of the solver's progress is written to screen

AZPREC.title: AZPREC (enum)
AZPREC.description:
Type of internal preconditioner to use.
Note! this preconditioner will only be used if the input operator
supports the Epetra interface and the client does not pass
in an external preconditioner!

AZREUSE.title: AZREUSE (int)
AZREUSE.description: The number specifying how often to recompute some preconditioners

AZSOLVE.title: AZSOLVE (enum)
AZSOLVE.description: Type of linear solver algorithm to use.

AZSUB.title: AZSUB (int)
AZSUB.description:
The maximum size of the Krylov subspace used with "GMRES" before
 a restart is performed.

AZTOL.title: AZTOL (double)
AZTOL.description: The level the residual norms must reach to decide about successful convergence

IFPACK_XML_FILE.description: This parameter describes the absolute or relative path to an xml file containing the configuration of a Trilinos/Ifpack preconditioner. The content of this xml file needs to follow Ifpack guidelines. Consult the Trilinos/Ifpack documentation and user guide for more information on valid Ifpack parameters..

MUELU_XML_FILE.title: MUELU_XML_FILE (path or null)
MUELU_XML_FILE.description: xml file defining any MueLu preconditioner

Optimize Slope Calculation.title: Optimize Slope Calculation (bool)
Optimize Slope Calculation.description: Boolean value. If set to true the value of $s^T J^T F$ is estimated using a directional derivative in a call to ::NOX::LineSearch::Common::computeSlopeWithOutJac. If false the slope computation is computed with the ::NOX::LineSearch::Common::computeSlope method. Setting this to true eliminates having to compute the Jacobian at each inner iteration of the More'-Thuente line search
